name: Serofans
overview: Serofans is a tribute to the first classic arcade machines (the ones that were at the beginning of the 80's), the game features 12 different games: 1 - A classic breakout. 2 - Another breakout 3 - Another breakout in the medieval Japan 4 - Breakout in the zoo 5 - Delta - A futuristic breakout 6 - Mystery Planet: A multiscroll space shooter in which the player have to pass different points in order before lose all his fuel. 7 - Sea Fighter: Destroy a ship using your submarine and avoiding being hit by the ship and the fishes 8 - Carnival Hunt: Destroy all the targets using the bullets of your gun. 9 - Dracon Walker: Sort of a maze game in which you have to defeat the enemies 10 - Gun Fighter: You are a gunfighter and you got to kill the evil gunmen that are in the town. 11 - Hunter: You are a hunter and you got to kill the animals that are in the jungle. 12 - War: You are a soldier and you got to kill the enemy tanks and planes. Manufacturer's description: Based on the concept of the video game world to reproduce the nostalgic past, Baraetigemu also recorded 12 games of Orijinaruretoro tone. Protect the town's western "Gun Fighter, " virtual target practice game, "Hunt Anibaru" to defeat the enemy looming "hunt" can enjoy a variety of games such as 1970's style. Features: Third & First person perspectives. 2D graphics Cartoon graphics SCI-FI, Wild West, Circus & Fantasy themes.
